ghostPage.plaintext:
I'm Alex Welcing, a web native native to Texas somewhere not upper west of much
of anything in the southern third of a small peninsula surrounded by people in
the northeast. My portfolio includes Sunday print fulls in Dallas Morning News
and Houston Chronicle, web product launches, successful new teams, and viral
social ads. As a hands-on producer and strategist, I can solo the whale (with a
team of professionals) or be an amplifying cog among the assets, copy, and code. 

Industry specific experience in Healthcare, Life Sciences, Insurance, CPG
Retail, Advertising, and Technology.
ghostPage.html:
I'm Alex Welcing, a web native native to Texas somewhere not upper west of much of anything in the southern third of a small peninsula surrounded by people in the northeast. My portfolio includes Sunday print fulls in Dallas Morning News and Houston Chronicle, web product launches, successful new teams, and viral social ads. As a hands-on producer and strategist, I can solo the whale (with a team of professionals) or be an amplifying cog among the assets, copy, and code.

Industry specific experience in Healthcare, Life Sciences, Insurance, CPG Retail, Advertising, and Technology.
